TWI.h File Reference

Master include file for the TWI peripheral driver. More...

Detailed Description

This file is the master dispatch header file for the device-specific ADC driver, for AVRs containing an ADC.

User code should include this file, which will in turn include the correct ADC driver header file for the currently selected AVR model.

Generated by  1.7.1
